modName: BAT Files For All Your Needs
summary: Need a Stealth Set without running around buying it, or search through Hex codes? How about every ingredient? Or maybe a few extra soul gems? With BAT files, it just a few keystrokes away.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=\"#00FF00\"]DESCRIPTION:[/color][/b]

The bat command is a very useful tool as it allows you to setup a txt file with several commands saved and have them run all at once.

Personally I got tired of dredging my way through hex codes to find a few pieces of gear I wanted to outfit my character with. So I started to save them as bat files, and tweaked them as time went on.

So now I am sharing them with you! I have three main basic sets: Stealth, Mage, and Warrior. I tried to keep them from getting over powered as I would use them on new characters. Feel free to suggest tweaks!

Want to make your own bat files? It\'s easier than pie! 
1 - Create a new txt document. 
2 - Name it something catchy/easy-to-remember/descriptive. 
3 - Write in your codes you want to run (One code per line!) and use \';\' to put in comments.
4 - Save.

I\'ve included some Hex Index files in the Misc DL section for you. Feel free to make your own, and let me know which ones turned out awesome!

[b][color=\"#00FF00\"]INSTALLATION:[/color][/b]

Download manually and move the txt file into your Skyrim game folder.
That\'s it.

[b][color=\"#00FF00\"]HOW TO USE:[/color][/b]

In game, open the console with the tilde key (~).
type \'bat [FILENAME]\'
That\'s it. Just type it without quotes and replace [FILENAME] with the txt file you want to run.
Seriously, it\'s that simple.

[b][color=\"#00FF00\"]CONTENTS:[/color][/b]
NOTE: To see what\'s included in a class set, check out the ReadMe file!

[color=\"#FF0000\"]1) AddStealthSet[/color]
- Starting Gear, Weapons, Armor, Spells, Misc for a basic Stealth Character

[color=\"#FF0000\"]2) AddMageSet[/color]
- Starting Gear, Weapons, Armor, Spells, Misc for a basic Mage Character

[color=\"#FF0000\"]3) AddWarriorSet[/color]
- Starting Gear, Weapons, Armor, Misc for a basic Warrior Character

[color=\"#FF0000\"]4) AddSoulGems[/color]
- Adds 1 of each Soul Gems
- Empty
- No Black Gems, Azura\'s Star, etc

[color=\"#FF0000\"]5) AddSoulGemsFilled[/color]
- Adds 1 of each Soul Gems
- Filled
- No Black Gems, Azura\'s Star, etc

[color=\"#FF0000\"]6) AddIngredients[/color]
- Adds 1 of each Ingredient
- No Quest Item Ingredients like Crimson Ninroot, Berit\'s Ashes, etc

[color=\"#FF0000\"]7) AllMagePerks[/color]
- Adds all perks for Alteration, Conjuration, Destruction, Enchanting, Illusion, and Restoration
- Perks added individually by skill or the whole set

[color=\"#FF0000\"]8) AllCombatPerks[/color]
- Adds all perks for Archery, Block, HeavyArmor, OneHanded, Smithing, and TwoHanded
- Perks added individually by skill or the whole set

[color=\"#FF0000\"]9) AllStealthPerks[/color]
- Adds all perks for Alchemy, Light Armor, Lockpicking, Pickpocket, Sneak, and Speech
- Perks added individually by skill or the whole set

[color=\"#FF0000\"]10) AllSkillBooks[/color]
- Adds one of every skill book

[b][color=\"#00FF00\"]IN PROGRESS AND/OR PLANNED:[/color][/b]

[color=\"#FF0000\"]1) Class Sets[/color]
*Not your basic sets!
*Will include items, spells, and more
*Custom tailored to that archetype
*More than likely to be OP for less than LV30

- Archer (Archery, Light Armor, Sneak, Block)
- Berserker (Two-Handed, Heavy Armor, Smith, Block)
- Spellsword (One-Handed, Destruction, Light Armor, Illusion)
- Necromancer (Conjuration, Illusion, Alteration, Restoration)
- Assassin (Sneak, One-Handed, Alchemy, Pickpocket)
- Battlemage (Destruction, Restoration, Illusion, Heavy Armor)
- Blademaster (One-Handed, Heavy Armor, Enchanting, Smithing)
- Rogue (Sneak, Illusion, Archery, Lockpicking)

[color=\"#FF0000\"]2) ADDALLENCHANTEDITEMS[/color]
- Adds all Weapons and Apparels that can be disenchanted

[color=\"#FF0000\"]3) ADDSKILLTREEMAX[/color]
*One for each Sign
*Levels it to 100
*Adds all perks

[color=\"#FF0000\"]4) ADDALLPERKS[/color]
*Adds all perks in all skill trees

[color=\"#FF0000\"]5) MAXLEVELCHARACTER[/color]
*Levels all Skills to 100
*Adds all Perks
*Maxs out your player\'s level

[color=\"#FF0000\"]6) REMOVEPERKS[/color]
*Remove Perks by skill tree
*Remove Perks by Set (magic, stealth, combat)
*Remove Perks completely
*(To remove a single perk, consult the Perk Index txt file in the Misc DLs)

[color=\"#FF0000\"]7) RESETCHARACTER[/color]
*Removes all Perks
*Removes all Spells
*Removes all Skill Levels
*Removes all Player Levels
*Removes all HP, MP, and Stamina Levels
*Removes Vampire and Werewolf
*Removes all Map Locations
*Removes all Equipment and Quest Items
*Removes all Quests
*Restarts 2nd Main Quest
*Teleports to Riverwood
*Opens Character/Race Build Menu
Note: Not sure if I can combine the teleport and the open race menu in same command due to the loading screen. Might just use race menu and suggest people \'coc riverwood\'.
Note: Not sure if I can get the quests to reset properly, but I sure will try!

[b][color=\"#00FF00\"]QUESTIONS, COMMENTS, AND CONCERNS:[/color][/b]

If you ever find something wrong (i.e. something missing, or something out of place) feel free to contact me and I\'ll fix it ASAP.

If you have ideas for a new bat file, please, please, please let me know!

If you have suggestions for a CLASS SET (improving one, or a new one), contact me with your ideas!
author: Craetions
